plot: His artistic vision lost, an iconic film Director decides to film his own final curtain, enlisting the unwitting help of an ambitious younger filmmaker in the process.
title: Goodbye Rosebud
plot_es: His artistic vision lost, an iconic film Director decides to film his own final curtain, enlisting the unwitting help of an ambitious younger filmmaker in the process.
plot_en: His artistic vision lost, an iconic film Director decides to film his own final curtain, enlisting the unwitting help of an ambitious younger filmmaker in the process.
